item.title: Fundamentals of Git
item.description: Explore some essential aspects of the version control tool Git. Concept Initially, as a newcomer, I confused Git with GitHub (a platform), not realizing Git is fundamentally a local tool. Some refer to it as a version control tool, a file system, or even a database with key-value pairs. To harness its capabilities, it’s crucial to understand the primary command: 1 git init This command creates a .git folder in
